column5: I'm all for fun but I guess these guys had a little too much American Beer and got out of control... http://www.buffalonews.com/258/story/883920.html
Bloody Canadians you can`t take them anywhere!!!
Cobourg eh.... Ron... go bail out your neighbours would ya...
Darn 'merican beer. Just 'cause it taste like water doesn't mean it drinks like it.  Don't judge all us Canucks based on three drunk bozos.
American beer... it's stronger than you think!!!
It,s piss water. And NO.I dont drink it.
Your remarks have made my day my Canadian friends.......  BTW....I drink Labatt's Blue Lite.......
i knew there would be repercussions to the yanks changing our Canadian sport...  coors light tonight ..and i only bought it for the t shirt..
